name: Battle Cubes: Multiplayer Third-Person Shooter (CrossPlatform)
description:
Battle Cubes is a Multiplayer Third-Person Shooter where you compete against real players in forms of Cubes! 

Game Features:

4 Online Maps to compete with your friends and REAL players!
Sticky bombs and different weapons would allow you to have interactive Gameplay!

3 different play modes!
Only Bombs
Chill
Deathmatch
Arena(offline)

In Arena mode will give you a challenge of surviving tons of enemies! You will be able to complete multiple waves of different enemies and earn gold to buy different customization for your Cube!

Customization Menu will allow you to customize your Cube any way you'd like to!
Big amount of different Hats, Things, Smiles and other stuff are waiting for you there!

Don't forget to track your statistics to see how much you've done!
